content:
`withdrawal-mainnet-shadowfork-2` is now live! Its currently still in bellatrix, we'll pick a transition epoch for shapella once the sepolia releases are out + some relays have had a chance to setup on there - we'll mainly use it for scenario testing. 

tooling link: https://ethstats.withdrawal-mainnet-shadowfork-2.ethpandaops.io/

We're still a bit light on tooling, it should be up soon. In the meantime, configs can be found here:
https://github.com/ethpandaops/withdrawals-testnet/tree/master/withdrawal-mainnet-shadowfork-2/custom_config_data

author: parithosh
content:
ethstats doesnt take into account the time I stall the chain in order to create the shadowfork, so the stat on block time gets messed up.

I've to sync to head -> stall chain -> take state and create genesis with block as exec_payload -> start shadowfork : and this process pads a decent bit of time to account for mistakes, etc.
